name: classes

return.description: The generated css for color classes

description: This mixin allows you to generate all the colors helpers classes like s-tc:accent, etc...

package.name: @coffeekraken/s-postcss-sugar-plugin
package.description: Postcss Coffeekraken plugin that gives you access to a ton of sugar like "@sugar.when.dark", "@sugar.classes", etc... mixins as well as functions like "sugar.padding", "sugar.color", etc... All of these makes uses of your theme configuration defined using the @coffeekraken/s-sugar-config system.
package.author: Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

docblocks.name: classes
docblocks.description: This mixin allows you to generate all the colors helpers classes like s-tc:accent, etc...

return.description: The generated css for color classes

docblocks.raw:
/**
*
* @name           classes
* @as          @s.color.classes
* @namespace      node.mixin.color
* @type           PostcssMixin
* @platform      postcss
* @status        stable
*
* This mixin allows you to generate all the colors helpers classes like s-tc:accent, etc...
*
* @return    {Css}         The generated css for color classes
*
* @snippet         @s.color.classes
*
* @example        css
* \@s.color.classes;
*
* @since       2.0.0
* @author         Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

*/
